definitions.title: n.pr.gent.
definitions.body: Mₑ’unim, Mₑ’unites (usu. connected with [[מָעוֹן]], (v. [[עון]]), but dub., cf. Buhl:Edom. 41 f.);—a people S. (SE ?) of Canaan (cf. Buhl:l.c.);—´[[הַמּ]] 2Ch 26:7 and 1Ch 4:41 Qr (Kt [[המעינים]], LXX:B tou\v Minai/ouv, LXXL t. Kinai/ouv; rd. also [[מֵהַמְּעוּנִים]] 2Ch 20:1 (for MT [[מֵהָעַמּוֹנִים]]), so LXX:BA (LXXL Ammanieim), Ew Be Ke Ot Kau Kit; [[בְּנֵי־מְעוּנִים]] (among Nethinim who went back with Zerub.) Ezr 2:50 = Ne 7:52 are perhaps descendants of those named above (2Ch 26:7). LXX oi( Minai=oi, but against ´[[מ]] = Minæans (Glaser:Skizze ii. 450 f. al.) v. Sprenger:ZMG xliv (1890), 505.
